problem.markdown:
1. All chiral substances exhibit _____ but some exhibits ________. () CD, ORD () ORD, CD (x) ORD ,ORD () CD ,CD
2. ORD is an ________ phenomena where as CD is an __________ phenomena. () Absorptive, Dispersive (x) Natural, super-natural () Dispersive, Absorptive () Classical, Relativistic
3. To study structure of macro molecules like protein in most of the cases _____ is preferred over ______. (x) CD ,ORD () ORD,CD () IR ,CD () UV , ORD
problem.p: 1. All chiral substances exhibit _____ but some exhibits ________.
2. ORD is an ________ phenomena where as CD is an __________ phenomena.
3. To study structure of macro molecules like protein in most of the cases _____ is preferred over ______.
